title: 20 min STANDING DUMBBELL WORKOUT | Sculpt and Strengthen | Full Body | No Repeats
description:
Join me for a 20 minute STANDING DUMBBELL WORKOUT to sculpt and strengthen your whole body. All you need is a medium set of dumbbells. Today I'll be using 8lb weights, but you can use anything from 5-12lb depending on your strength level. Intervals will be 45 seconds on and 15 seconds rest. This is a NO WRISTS workout, which means no planks, pushups or burpees! Make sure you're warmed up and let's get sculpting! 💞 xox Mik

EQUIPMENT:
- Medium Set of Dumbbells (8lbs) 

WARMUP: https://youtu.be/Pd5ggr1bEqg
COOLDOWN: https://youtu.be/_rDpurTu5kA

💞 WOMEN'S BEST LEGGINGS: 💞
https://womens.best/fitbymik

#nowrists #dumbbellworkout #fullbody
channelDescription:
Hey! My name is Mikala, but you might know me as fitbymik! I am a fitness instructor, personal trainer, dancer and aerialist born and raised in Toronto Canada. I have a passion for health and fitness that lead me to a Bachelors Degree in Kinesiology, and over a decade of teaching in the fitness industry. Some of the class genres I have taught include Barre Fitness, Strength and Conditioning, Yoga, Pilates, Zumba, Aquafit, dance and gymnastics. I also have years of expertise with one-on-one personal training and fitness coaching. One of my favourite things about this industry is the ability to help others achieve their goals and feel their best!

In between teaching and learning, I spent many years performing as a dancer and aerialist with Norwegian Cruise Line. I also performed as an aerialist at Tokyo Disney Resort in Japan!

I can’t wait to continue bringing more workouts and challenges to help YOU reach your fitness and flexibility goals!

comments: I am genuinely so surprised about how effective a 20 minute exercise can be! I’ve lost 3kgs and barely even changed my diet, and I’m only doing about 2 to 3 times a week 🤯
It felt like I was barely started when the 20 mins lapsed but the sweat that rolled off me tells me that this is some genuine workout session. Love it. More of these workouts, please. Thank you. ❣
I love these 20 minute workouts! It's perfect for when I don't have enough time. I cannot get enough of the 20-30 minute full body videos. Perfect for a busy AF single mom. Thank you girl!

I'm 61 and was able to do this today (first time) with 10 lb. dumbbells.  Oh....."sweat is your fat, crying!" 🤣  And mine cried a lot!  Outstanding - totally enjoyed this and look forward to doing more of your workouts.
It is such a gift to do your workouts. The best thing is your calm demeanour. I'm so sick of being yelled at or super high energy videos. Thank you!
